00042 namespace MESQUITE_NS
00043 {
00044   class MESQUITE_EXPORT Timer
00045   {
00046   public:
00047     Timer();
00048 
00049     void reset();//resets the timer as if it were just created
00050     
00051     double since_last_check(); //- return time in seconds since last
00052                                //- call to since_last_check().  Note that
00053                                //- calling since_birth() doesn't count
00054                                //- as a check.  The first time this function
00055                                //- is called, it returns the time since birth.
00056     
00057     double since_birth() const;//- return time in seconds since
00058                                //- object was created.
00059     
00060   private:
00061     double atBirth;      //- Time at birth
00062     double atLastCheck;        //- Time at last call to since_last_check()
00063   };
00064   
00065   
00066   class MESQUITE_EXPORT StopWatch
00067   {
00068   public:
00069       // Creates the stopwatch.  The stopwatch is stopped
00070       // until start() is called.
00071     StopWatch() 
00072         :isRunning(false), totalTime(0.0), numStarts(0)
00073       {}
00074     
00075       // Starts the stopwatch.  If it was already running,
00076       // this function does nothing.
00077     void start();
00078     
00079       // Stops the stopwatch.  If it was not already running,
00080       // this function does nothing
00081     void stop();
00082     
00083       // Stops the stopwatch and resets the total_time() to zero.
00084     void reset();
00085     
00086       // Returns the total accumulated time.  If the stopwatch
00087       // is currently running, the time between the last start()
00088       // and the current time IS included in total_time().
00089     double total_time() const;    
00090       
00093     int number_of_starts() const{
00094         return numStarts;
00095       }
00096 
00097     
00098   private:
00099     bool isRunning;
00100     double timeAtLastStart;
00101     double totalTime;
00102     int numStarts;
00103   };
00104   
00105   class StopWatchCollection
00106   {
00107   public:
00108     typedef size_t Key;
00109     
00110       // Create a new collection
00111     MESQUITE_EXPORT StopWatchCollection()
00112       {}
00113     
00114       // Add a stopwatch to the collection.  Returns a non-zero
00115       // StopWatchCollection::Key if it succeeds, zero if it fails.
00116       // If a StopWatch with the given name already exists in the
00117       // collection, the Key of the existing StopWatch is returned
00118       // if 'fail_if_exists' is false, or zero is returned if
00119       // 'fail_if_exists' is true.
00120     MESQUITE_EXPORT Key add(const std::string &name, bool fail_if_exists = true);
00121     
00122       // Gets the Key for an existing stopwatch.  If a stopwatch
00123       // with the given name does not exist, function returns zero.
00124     MESQUITE_EXPORT Key get_key(const std::string &name) const;
00125 
00127     MESQUITE_EXPORT std::string get_string(const Key key){
00128         return mEntries[key-1].first;}
00130     MESQUITE_EXPORT void get_string(const Key key, std::string &new_string){
00131       new_string=mEntries[key-1].first;}
00132     
00133       // Remove a specific stopwatch.
00134     MESQUITE_EXPORT void remove(const Key key);
00135     MESQUITE_EXPORT void remove(const std::string &name)
00136       { remove(get_key(name)); }
00137     
00138       // start a specific stopwatch
00139     MESQUITE_EXPORT void start(const Key key);
00140     MESQUITE_EXPORT void start(const std::string &name)
00141       { start(get_key(name)); }
00142     
00143       // stop a specific stopwatch
00144     MESQUITE_EXPORT void stop(const Key key);
00145     MESQUITE_EXPORT void stop(const std::string &name)
00146       { stop(get_key(name)); }
00147     
00148       // reset a specific stopwatch
00149     MESQUITE_EXPORT void reset(const Key key);
00150     MESQUITE_EXPORT void reset(const std::string &name)
00151       { reset(get_key(name)); }
00152     
00153       // Get the total time for a specific stopwatch, zero if
00154       // the stopwatch doesn't exist.
00155     MESQUITE_EXPORT double total_time(const Key key) const;
00156     MESQUITE_EXPORT double total_time(const std::string &name) const
00157       { return total_time(get_key(name)); }
00158       // Get the number of times a StopWatch was started.
00159     MESQUITE_EXPORT int number_of_starts(const Key key) const;
00160     MESQUITE_EXPORT int number_of_starts(const std::string &name) const
00161       { return number_of_starts(get_key(name));}
00162     
00163       //Gets the number of stop watches in the collection
00164     MESQUITE_EXPORT int number_of_stop_watches(){
00165       return (int) mEntries.size();}
00166 
00167     MESQUITE_EXPORT void get_keys_sorted_by_time(std::vector<Key> &sorted_keys);
00168     
00169   private:
00170     std::vector< std::pair<std::string, StopWatch> > mEntries;
00171   };
00172   
00173   MESQUITE_EXPORT std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream&, StopWatchCollection& coll );
00174   
00175     // A stopWatchCollection available anywhere
00176   extern Mesquite::StopWatchCollection GlobalStopWatches;
00177 
00178   MESQUITE_EXPORT inline void print_timing_diagnostics( int debugflag )
00179     { MSQ_DBGOUT(debugflag) << GlobalStopWatches; }
00180 
00181   MESQUITE_EXPORT inline void print_timing_diagnostics( std::ostream& stream )
00182     { stream << GlobalStopWatches; }

00185 class FunctionTimer
00186 {
00187   public:
00188     inline FunctionTimer( StopWatchCollection::Key key ) : mKey( key ) {}
00189     inline void start()      { GlobalStopWatches.start( mKey ); }
00190     inline ~FunctionTimer()  { GlobalStopWatches.stop( mKey ); }
00191   private:
00192     StopWatchCollection::Key mKey;
00193     // Don't allow any of this stuff (make them private)
00194     void* operator new(size_t size);
00195     FunctionTimer( const FunctionTimer& );
00196     FunctionTimer& operator=( const FunctionTimer& );
00197 };
00198 
00199 #ifdef MSQ_USE_FUNCTION_TIMERS
00200   #define MSQ_FUNCTION_TIMER( NAME ) \
00201     static Mesquite::StopWatchCollection::Key _mesquite_timer_key = \
00202       Mesquite::GlobalStopWatches.add( NAME, false );               \
00203     FunctionTimer _mesquite_timer( _mesquite_timer_key );           \
00204     _mesquite_timer.start()
00205 #else
00206   #define MSQ_FUNCTION_TIMER( NAME )
00207 #endif

00209 }  // namespace Mesquite
